sqlMap.select: select t.TAR_CODE, t.TAR_NAME from PFM_TM_QTY_DEF t inner join sys_unitmap t1 on t.create_org = t1.unit_id where t.TAR_SCOPE in ('01000000','11000000') and PFM_IDL_GET_STORE_DATE(#storeDate#,t.tar_code) =#storeDate# and t.TAR_TYPE ='3' and t.tar_status='1' and t1.rela_unitid=#unitId#
select $sqlColumnStr$ S.STAFF_ID as "staffId", S.STAFF_NAME as "staffName", S.OWNER_UNITID as "blOrg" from SYS_STAFF S $sqlJoinStr$ where S.STAFF_ID IN ($staffIdStr$)
select count(1) as STAFF_ID from PFM_EM_QTY_STF where STAFF_ID = #staffId# and TAR_CODE = #tarCode# and STORE_DATE = #storeDate#
sqlMap.update: update PFM_EM_QTY_STF set TAR_VALUE = #tarValue:DOUBLE#, LOAD_DATE = #loadDate#, LAST_UPD_USER = #lastUpdUser#, LAST_UPD_TIME = #lastUpdTime#, LAST_UPD_ORG = #lastUpdOrg# where STAFF_ID=#staffId# and TAR_CODE=#tarCode# and STORE_DATE=#storeDate#
sqlMap.delete: delete from PFM_EM_QTY_STF where STAFF_ID=#staffId# and TAR_CODE=#tarCode# and STORE_DATE=#storeDate#
